《幸存者的秘密之书》现在已在美国发售
由Marsh Davies在2016年8月9日发布

你能用一根钓鱼竿打败一大群僵尸吗？或者只用一块沙子和火把阻止要塞里怪物的攻击？这些幸存者知道那些一群从beta就开始玩Minecraft的精英玩家是如何以他们的智慧为生的，不过他们不为人所知。现在他们走到台前将他们的智慧凝结成这一本《幸存者的秘密之书》。
英国非常幸运，在6月就能得到这些幸存者的才能。但是，截止今天，这本强大的书在美国发售了！点击这里看看如何在这里买书！
不仅这是一本相当有用的书，而且也是一点点观看者（这里的looker什么意思？）-我们通过《世界大战Ⅱ时代手册》获得了灵感。再现了那种耐磨的衣服。这本实用手册同时也是给那些准备冒险进入陌生的土地的军人和女军人的。
我们认为这本书看起来（感觉起来）相当好。看看这些浮雕和帆布套！嗯...有感觉的（这里的tactile什么意思？）！耐用的书！

原文（英语不好慎入）：

THE SURVIVORS’ BOOK OF SECRETS NOW OUT IN THE USPosted on Aug 9, 2016 by Marsh Davies
Could you vanquish a zombie horde with a fishing rod? Or shut down a fortress assault with no more than a block of sand and a torch? The Survivors know how - they’re an elite group of players who’ve been around since the beta, living off their wits and in the shadows. Now they’ve stepped into the light to offer you their hard-won wisdom in The Survivors’ Book of Secrets.The UK was lucky enough to receive the Survivors’ genius in June, but, as of today, this mighty tome is available in the US. Hooray! Choose how to buy it here!Not only is it a rather useful book, but it’s a bit of a looker too - we were inspired by World War II era manuals, recreating the sort of hard-wearing, practical handbook that was given out to servicemen and women as they prepared to venture into unfamiliar lands.We think it looks (and feels) rather good. Check out the embossed, canvas cover! Mmm… So, tactile! So, durable!
It’s illustrated, too!
Go snap it up and prepare to survive.Cheerio!
